www.keystoneframework.comKEYSTONE is a modern, multi-paradigm, data-centric software development framework.Our main goal is to assist developers like you in the build of great business software, very fast and without compromising architectural value.A unique design combined with obssessive code aesthetics enable Keystone to instill its quality hallmark to the software based on it.Responsabilities.Lead the team of UX Designers, Marketers and Product Evangelists.Plan, develop, and execute marketing and branding strategies and campaign across all digital platforms to achieve key business objectives.Lead the execution of strategies, such as content marketing, paid & organic marketing, SEO & website management and social media.Business developmentAccount management with clients such as Metlife, Afore Banorte, PwC

Guiding and inspiring the design team to create engaging experiences for users across multiple platforms.Establish and maintain high creative standards, providing detailed direction and insight to the design team throughout the life cycle of the design processWork closely with the UX/UI designers to concept, storyboard, wireframe, prototype intuitive and engaging user experiences.Supervise the creation of production-ready art assets and style guides for implementation by the development team.Managing the workloads, timelines, dependencies, and deliverables of the design team.Present designs to clients or managers and facilitate effective feedback mechanisms.Proactively assess and recommend improvements to the user experience based on analytics and users feedback.Collaborate with product management or clients to drive business requirements, scenarios, and use cases.Advocate for usability, design and innovation within the organization.I have managed projects for clients such as: PwC, Invex, Schlumberger, Volaris, Banamex

summary: I am a highly experienced in providing first-level innovation and user centered design counseling. I've developed and participated in projects for top companies, startups and brands of all industries.I have over 12 years of experience, with a diverse background specializing in multiple disciplines throughout my career such as design thinking, user research, user interface design (UI), user experience design(UX), branding, eCommerce, digital marketing (email mkt, SEO and SEM, advertising, social media, content mkt), usability and accesibility, management and team leadership. I am a highly strategic and conceptual thinker that love push creative boundaries. I love to manage the entire design process from user research and analysis and strategic planning, through design and construction and see the final product come to life in a way that delights our users while generating revenue for our business.I have a relentless desire for innovation, that I balance with business needs, and customer expectations.Through the years I have developed deep understanding of real world customer attitudes, needs and expectations – specifically relating to interaction through web and mobile.I have an interest and passion around managing and developing others in a flexible and adaptable way.I have a strong background in art, specifically in painting, music and photography. This has allowed me to approach design and management from a different perspective, it has also given me more sensitivity to understand the users needs. You can find some of my work in: https://nanzui.myportfolio.com/
name: Nanzui Palomino
title: Co Founder, UX Specialist & Digital Innovation Strategist
